original: Forster, Carl Svante Teodor, direktör, Holsljunga, f. 24/5/90 i Karlskrona av sjökapt. Teodor F. o. Hilda Johansson. G. 16 m. Anne Marie Larsson. Barn: Lars Gunnar f. 17, Marianne 18, Bengt 20, Barbro 21, Göran 22, Karin 23. — Mog:ex. i Karlskrona 08, KTH (skeppsbygg.) 09-13. Anst. å Götaverkens i Gbg ritkont. 13-14, v. Ljusne-Woxna A-B 14, sjötjg. o. tjg. v. flottans varv i Karlskrona 14-15, rit. v. Eriksbergs Mek. Verkst. 15-16, varvsing :assist. där 16-18, varvsing. 18-35 o. v. verkst. dir. 35-46. Sekr. i Sv. varvsindifören. 31-44. RNO, RVO.
translated: Forster, Carl Svante Teodor, director, Holsljunga, born on May 24th, 1890 in Karlskrona to sea captain Teodor F. and Hilda Johansson. Married on August 16th to Anne Marie Larsson. Children: Lars Gunnar born in 1917, Marianne in 1918, Bengt in 1920, Barbro in 1921, Göran in 1922, and Karin in 1923. Completed military service in Karlskrona in 1908, attended the Royal Institute of Technology (specializing in shipbuilding) from 1909-1913. Employed at Götaverken in Gothenburg as a draftsperson from 1913-1914, then at Ljusne-Woxna AB from 1914. Served as a naval officer and officer at the navy yard in Karlskrona from 1914-1915, then as a designer at Eriksbergs Mekaniska Verkstad from 1915-1916 and as a chief designer's assistant there from 1916-1918. He became a chief designer in 1918 and held this position until 1935, when he was appointed managing director until 1946. Secretary of the Swedish shipbuilding industry association from 1931-1944. Awarded the Order of the North Star and the Order of Vasa.
